gen:link.label:label: BV618_1: The capital charge for health expense risk reported in S.26.04 -Solvency Capital Requirement - Health underwriting risk should be equal to the loss in the value of assets minus liabilities (after the loss absorbing capacity of technical provisions) after the shock, with a minimum of zero. -->Template 1: S.26.04; Expression: If {r0060,c0010}=[s2c_AP:x34] then {r0500,c0060}=MAX(0,({r0500,c0020}-{r0500,c0030})-({r0500,c0040}-{r0500,c0050}))

BV618_1: The capital charge for health expense risk reported in S.26.04 -Solvency Capital Requirement - Health underwriting risk should be equal to the loss in the value of assets minus liabilities (after the loss absorbing capacity of technical provisions) after the shock, with a minimum of zero. -->Template 1: S.26.04; Expression: If {r0060,c0010}=[s2c_AP:x34] then {r0500,c0060}=MAX(0,({r0500,c0020}-{r0500,c0030})-({r0500,c0040}-{r0500,c0050}))
